Package index

Package Overview

tidynorm tidynorm-package
tidynorm: Tools for Tidy Vowel Normalization

Normalization Procedures

Tidy normalization procedures to be applied to your formant data frames.

Point measurements

norm_generic()
Generic Normalization Procedure
norm_barkz()
Bark Difference Normalize
norm_deltaF()
Delta F Normalize
norm_lobanov()
Lobanov Normalize
norm_nearey()
Nearey Normalize
norm_wattfab()
Watt & Fabricius Normalize

Formant tracks

norm_track_generic()
Generic Formant Track Normalization Procedure
norm_track_barkz()
Bark Difference Track Normalization
norm_track_deltaF()
Delta F Track Normalization
norm_track_lobanov()
Lobanov Track Normalization
norm_track_nearey()
Nearey Track Normalization
norm_track_wattfab()
Watt and Fabricius Track normalization

DCT Coefficients

norm_dct_generic()
Generic Formant DCT Normalization Procedure

DCT

Basic DCT Functions

dct()
Discrete Cosine Transform
idct()
Inverse Discrete Cosine Transform
idct_rate()
Inverse Discrete Cosine Transform Rate
idct_accel()
Inverse Discrete Cosine Transform Acceleration
dct_basis()
DCT Basis

Tidy DCT Functions

reframe_with_dct()
Reframe with DCT
reframe_with_idct()
Reframe with IDCT
reframe_with_dct_smooth()
Reframe with DCT Smooth

Transforms

hz_to_bark()
Hz to Bark
hz_to_mel()
Hz to Mel
bark_to_hz()
Bark to Hz
mel_to_hz()
Mel to Hz

Data

speaker_data
Speaker Data
speaker_tracks
Speaker Tracks
